mapper.insert: insert into board(boardWriter, boardTitle, boardContents, fileAttached, memberId) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached}, #{memberId})
insert into board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as createdAt, boardHits from board order by id desc
select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as createdAt, boardHits from board order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as createdAt, boardHits from board where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%') order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(id) from board where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, boardContents, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as createdAt, boardHits from board where id = #{id}
